titles: A farewel-sermon preached to the united parishes of St. Mary Woolnoth & St. Mary Woolchurch-Haw in Lombard-Street by David Jones
author: Jones, David, 1663-1724?
publisher: Printed for Thomas Parkhurst ... and Brab. Aylmer ...,
notes: Running title: A farewell sermon preach'd in Lombard-Street.
